name: Dune II: Battle For Arrakis
description:
Dune II: Battle For Arrakis is a strategy game developed by Westwood Studios. It was originally released in 1992. It was published by Virgin Interactive. The game is rated as "Exceptional" on RAWG.
You can play Dune II: Battle For Arrakis on PC, Commodore / Amiga and Genesis.
It was produced by Brett Sperry. It was directed by Aaron E. Powell and Lyle J. Hall. It was scored by Dwight Okahara, Frank Klepacki and Paul Mudra.
